message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.LG 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to analyze online debates and distinguish between factual and emotional argumentation styles. Therefore, it is most likely to belong to the sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper uses techniques such as bootstrapping and pattern extraction, which are commonly used in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) sub-categories. The paper also deals with analyzing linguistic expressions, which could fall under the sub-category of Cybersecurity (cs.CY). Finally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to analyze large sets of data, which could also fall under the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG).
